title:
Black ecstasy running through these veins
crying dreams of immortality
in my soul, swirling colors
rushing...

attachments.displayName:
Black ecstasy running through these veins
crying dreams of immortality
in my soul, swirling colors
rushing fast through fields of pain
when everything smells like purple.
Seeing clouds of fire, hazing over my eyes
shiny crimson seas, falling to the floor
screeching in my ears.
Pain searing black, twirling through
my system and then silence.
Beyond dead just emptiness
hollow worlds, filling up spaces that
begin to not exist....A bone aching nothing

NOT MY POEM

object.content:
Black ecstasy running through these veins
crying dreams of immortality
in my soul, swirling colors
rushing fast through fields of pain
when everything smells like purple.
Seeing clouds of fire, hazing over my eyes
shiny crimson seas, falling to the floor
screeching in my ears.
Pain searing black, twirling through
my system and then silence.
Beyond dead just emptiness
hollow worlds, filling up spaces that
begin to not exist....A bone aching nothing

NOT MY POEM
